page.title: 08Bad Point of Flats/Millbrook
page.content: 1. It takes an extra 5 minutes to go anywhere. 2. There is no garden play in. 3. People vandalise the intercom. 4. Friends can't just knock on your door to play. 5. Lifts sometimes break down. 6. Babies might climb on the window sill and fall. 7. Dogs are not allowed and it is unfair to cats. 8. Children can't go out to play without an adult. 9. Window cleaning difficult. 10. Washing must be dried on small balcony. 11. Potted plants blow off balconies and children can't see. 12. Two prams won't fit in the lift so two mothers can't go out together. 13. Shopping from cars has to be gathered in the entrance hall.
